feed.title: ExoGame
feed.subtitle: This is the ebsite for the ATOS Gamification website, as part of our COMP204P module.

entry.title: Welcome
entry.content: Welcome to our website. This will be used to showcase our COMP204P project. The project is called ATOS Gamification. File all bugs/feature requests at the GitHub Repositry. If you have questions, you can email them to arjun.khurana.15@ucl.ac.uk.
entry.summary: Welcome to our website. This will be used to showcase our COMP204P project. The project is called ATOS Gamification. File all bugs/feature requests at the GitHub Repositry. If you have questions, you can email them to arjun.khurana.15@ucl.ac.uk.
